name: wasm-graphql-parser
description: Just a basic graphql parser that uses Apollo's rust parser and custom logic to extract all info from a schema

scripts.compile-dev-node: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.compile-dev-bundler: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.compile-dev-web: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.compile-prod-node: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser --release --scope luis-domenech -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.compile-prod-bundler: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser --release --scope luis-domenech -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.compile-prod-web: rimraf ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../packages/wasm-graphql-parser --release --scope luis-domenech -- --offline && yarn cp-types
scripts.publish-pkg: yarn && yarn login && yarn compile-prod && cd ../wasm-graphql-parser && wasm-pack publish --access=public

author: Luis F. Domenech Ortiz <luisfabiandomenech@gmail.com>
